archimate:Capability.name: Transactional Document Formatter
archimate:Capability.documentation: Transactional Document Formatter is used to develop a transactional document such as a bill or letter by specifying the format template, the data input source specification, and the associated runtime rules that ties the data input to the format template.

properties.value: Bills and Letter Template Formatting transactional Document Input Binding Rules to Template Transactional Document Input Data Source Definition Transactional Document Template Resource Definition Transactional Document Template Usage Business Rules
